/>
X.v.1.D.6.b
.
Adding the Hearing Transcript to the Claims Folder
Follow the procedures in the table below to add the hearing transcript to the claims folder.
If ...
Then ...
the hearing transcript is received electronically
upload the document to the electronic claims folder (eFolder), following the procedures in the
VBMS Core User Guide
.
a hard copy of the hearing transcript is received
send the transcript to the scanning vendor for upload into the folder.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section D  - Regional Office (RO) Hearings
citation: Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section D
